articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Visits Turkmenistan
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Visits Turkmenistan
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho visited Turkmenistan on April 7 and 8.
					 During the visit, Ri Yong Ho had talks with Rashid Meredov, foreign minister of Turkmenistan.
					
					 Exchanged at the talks were a series of matters arising in further developing the traditional friendly relations between the two countries and international and regional issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Rashid Meredov expressed his will for developing the friendly relations with the DPRK in the future, hailing the fact that the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made important proposals for improving the north-south relations from the beginning of the year and the course of detente started on the Korean peninsula thanks to the practical measures for implementing them and the progress is being made in developing the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Ri Yong Ho paid a courtesy call on Mammedowa Gulsat, speaker of the Parliament.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government delegation headed by Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho arrived in Moscow on Monday to make an official visit to Russia.
					 That day the delegation left Ashkhabad after wrapping up its visit to Turkmenistan.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Figure Here
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Figure Here
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Aleksei Kozitski, chairman of the Maritime Territorial Branch Committee of "A Just Russia", and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Art Troupes Here
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Art Troupes Here
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Art troupes of Koreans in Japan and China arrived here to take part in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes, Delegations, Delegates Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes, Delegations, Delegates Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Chelyabinsk State Ural Dance Group of Russia, the Volinaya Stepi Cossack Art Troupe of Russia, a Portuguese conductor, the Lao State Art Troupe, a soloist of the Japan-Korea Society for Music and Art Interchange, a Polish soloist, the Classical Ballet Group of the State Music Academy Theatre of Belarus, the Circus of State Acrobatic Company of Russia, the Moscow Bolshoi State Circus of Russia, the Belarusian National Circus and a Singaporean magician arrived here on Monday to take part in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 Also arriving here on the same day were a delegation of the China International Culture Dissemination Centre, delegation of the Kaifeng City Cultural Exchange of China, a vice mayor of Mozhajsk City of Russia and the president of the Moscow Peace Fund of Russia.

articles.title: WHO Representative Hosts Reception
articles.content:
WHO Representative Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Thushara Fernando, representative of the World Health Organization here, Monday hosted a reception on the World Health Day.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, officials concerned, and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Attending it were members of the WHO mission.

articles.title: World Health Day Marked
articles.content:
World Health Day Marked
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- An event for marking the World Health Day took place at the Grand People's Study House on Monday.
					 Present at the event were officials of ministries and national institutions and those in the fields of public health and media and members of missions of international bodies here including representative of the WHO, the UN resident coordinator and concurrently UNDP resident representative.
					
					 At the event speakers talked about the advantages of the socialist healthcare system of the DPRK in which the state takes the full responsibility for the lives and health of the people with care.
					
					 They stressed the need to establish the system for health service for all people in all countries for the purpose of the sustained development and advanced health service, and to secure enough number of health service workers.
					
					 The event heard data on universal health service and the section doctor system which is being enforced in the DPRK.
					
					 The participants looked round posters and photos dealing with the prevention of noninfectious diseases and universal health services.
					
					 They toured the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital.
					
					 On the same day the intensive hygienic information service took place in every province.

articles.title: Film Show Week Opens to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Film Show Week Opens to Mark Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A week of film show opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang International Cinema House on April 9 in celebration of the Day of the Sun.
					 During the week, documentaries about the revolutionary career and feats and popular personality of President Kim Il Sung will be on show at cinemas and houses of culture in Pyongyang and other parts of the country.
					
					 It includes "Always in the Hearts of Mankind," "The Eternal Sun of Mankind", etc.
					
					 "Star of Korea", "Mt Paektu", "Bright Morning" and other feature films will be shown.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were officials concerned and creators and artistes in the cinematic art field and Pyongyangites.
					
					 On the same day, the film show week opened in each province.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Monday to celebrate the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Dancing parties began in different parts of the capital city including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium amid the playing of song "Please Accept Best Wishes of People".
					
					 The participants danced to the tune of songs "The General Star beyond the Clouds" and "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem", with gratitude for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They also danced with honor and pride of upholding the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, singing the song "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" in chorus. 
					
					 Dancing parties revved up the festive mood when "Song of Youth" and "We Are Mallima Riders" resounded forth.
					
					 On the same day, dancing parties took place in provincial seats.

articles.title: Meari Foodstuff-processing Factory
articles.content:
Meari Foodstuff-processing Factory
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Foodstuff Factories in the DPRK have produced various functional foodstuffs for the improvement of people's standard of living.
					 Among them is the modern Meari Foodstuff-processing Factory which produces over ten kinds of tasty and nutritious foodstuffs like noodle, soy and sweet jelly with locally available raw materials.
					
					 In particular, noodles made with five grains, yam and arrowroot are getting popular for having such effects as raising the immunity, strengthening bone, improving liver function and lowering cholesterol.
					
					 And soya-peptide soy, mushroom soy and lobster soy are highly appreciated among the hypertensive and other people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Prosperity of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Prosperity of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an editorial to the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The editorial says President Kim Il Sung's idea and cause of building a powerful country was successfully carried forward and a grand era when the DPRK was dashing forward to be a socialist powerful nation opened on this land thanks to April 9 when Kim Jong Il assumed the heavy responsibility as the chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK by the unanimous will and aspiration of the army and people.
					
					 It notes that Kim Jong Il was the peerless patriot and elder statesman who laid the strong foundation for the prosperity of the country and its people. 
					
					 It points out that he put the dignity of the DPRK on the highest level by the steadfast independent politics and turned the DPRK into the matchless military power with his unique Songun politics. This is the exploit that will shine forever in the history of the country, it adds.
					
					 It was the exploit noteworthy in the history of the nation that he made the DPRK a great family of socialism with his noble politics of love for the people, it says.
					
					 It is the greatest exploit he performed for the everlasting prosperity of the DPRK that he successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership, it notes, adding:
					
					 He did everything possible for the country and its people, making his way through virgin snow of the history as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. His exploits will shine for all ages.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media Condemned for Disgracing April 3 Popular Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media Condemned for Disgracing April 3 Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News, the all-people committee for commemorating the 70th anniversary of Jeju April 3 incident released a statement on April 5, condemning the conservative media for distorting the truth of the April 3 popular uprising and defending the U.S.
					 The statement expressed indignation for the conservative media such as Munhwa Ilbo and Chosun Ilbo which distorted the truth and justice of the uprising and blamed the organization for participating in a meeting for denouncing the U.S. under the auspices of reunification movement organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					
					 It urged the conservative media to stop slandering the spirit of the uprising at once, saying their mud-slinging was based on the sinister aim to distort the truth of the uprising.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Fascist Regime's Distortion of Truth about Kwangju Popular Uprising Exposed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Fascist Regime's Distortion of Truth about Kwangju Popular Uprising Exposed
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the former military fascist regime distorted the truth of the Kwangju Popular Uprising and covered up the massacre of resistance fighters and citizens who took part in it through the 511 Research Committee, a secret body under the army organized in May 1988, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 This was revealed by the May 18 Democratic Movement-related Academy on April 3.
					
					 According to it, the military cooked up a document distorting the truth about the Kwangju Popular Uprising ahead of the "National Assembly" hearing in those days.
					
					 The document was used by the ultra-right conservative forces for slandering and distorting the uprising.
					
					 It said that the motivations of the uprising were the citizens' violent demonstration, rumor and regional sentiments, not the U.S. colonial rule and the repressive policy imposed by the military fascist regime.
					
					 Noting that traitor Chun Doo Hwan massively introduced "martial law forces" into Kwangju to burn the city and barbarously massacre uprisers under the backstage manipulation of the U.S., it said this was caused by individual officers and soldiers, not by the order given by the military.
					
					 As for the opening of fire, the document said it is hard to blame anyone as it was pursuant to the judgment by the "martial law forces" themselves and that the "martial law" was an inevitable effort to end the social chaos that followed students' demonstration.
					
					 The Academy also disclosed that the 511 Research Committee deleted testimonies made by the military fascists who ordered to open fire at the uprisers, forged military data related to the suppression of the uprising and cut down the number of civilians massacred.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet at the Poligraficka Birova Publishing House of the Czech Republic, on March 29.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the validity of the new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force set forth by the WPK and explains why the Party adopted this line.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Myanmar Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Myanmar Figures
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Figures of Myanmar issued statements on April 1 and 3 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said that the world progressives together with the Korean people are significantly celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung as a holiday common to humankind.
					
					 He noted that Kim Il Sung is the peerlessly elder statesman who explored the era of independence and victoriously advanced it and is being boundlessly revered by everyone as he was possessed of noble traits, adding:
					
					 He made great contributions not only to the Korean revolution but also to the world revolution.
					
					 Maung Maung Naying, director general of the Myit Tar Moe Publishing House of Myanmar, said that Kim Il Sung is the greatest man who dedicated his all to the people's happiness, the country's prosperity and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The director general noted that Kim Il Sung is the prominent leader who defeated two imperialisms in one generation, built the socialist system centered on the popular masses and thus translated the long-cherished desire of the Korean people into reality.
					
					 He said that Kim Il Sung's immortal exploits will always be cherished in the minds of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed by the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture on April 5.
					 Manfred Schneider, chief of the group, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from April 5 to 15 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including a seminar, photo exhibition and film show to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung in the period.

articles.title: Korean Books Donated to Russian University
articles.content:
Korean Books Donated to Russian University
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- There took place a Korean book-donating ceremony at Amur State Humanities-Education University of Russia on April 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Conveyed at the ceremony were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, books in praise of the exploits of the peerless great men and those introducing the proud reality of daily prospering Juche Korea and the Korean nation with a history and culture spanning five thousand years .
					
					 Attending the ceremony were the vice-president, teachers and students of the university and officials of the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Salud
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Salud
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo el acto dedicado al Dia Mundial de Salud con la participacion de los funcionarios de los ministerios, organos centrales e instituciones de salud publica, prensa e informacion, el representante de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud, el coordinador permanente de la ONU y representante permanente del Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo y otros miembros de las representaciones de organizaciones internacionales en Corea.
					Los oradores se refirieron a las ventajas del sistema de salud publica socialista de Corea en que el Estado se responsabiliza por la vida y salud del pueblo.
					
					Insistieron en la necesidad de establecer en todos los paises el sistema de servicios sanitarios para todo el pueblo y asegurar suficientemente el numero de funcionarios de salud publica para alcanzar la meta de desarrollo sostenible y desarrollar la salud publica. 
					
					Luego, se presentaron los datos sobre la asistencia medica general y el sistema del medico por zonas que se aplican en Corea. 
					
					Los participantes vieron las pancartas y fotos sobre la prevencion de las enfermedades no epidemicas y los servicios medicos generales.
					
					Acto seguido, visitaron el Hospital Universal de Oftalmologia Ryugyong.
					
					Con motivo de la referida efemeride, tuvieron lugar el mismo dia las propagandas higienicas en todas las provincias.

articles.title: Iniciado ciclo de cine por el Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Iniciado ciclo de cine por el Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado en esta capital y todas las provincias del pais el ciclo de cine dedicado al Dia del Sol, natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Se proyectaran en este periodo en los cines y casas culturales capitalinos y locales los documentales como "Siempre en el alma de la humanidad" y "Eterno Sol de la humanidad" que demuestran la vida revolucionaria, hazanas y rasgos populares del Presidente.
					
					   Tambien, se llevaran a la pantalla "El lucero de Corea", "Monte Paektu", "Amanecer brillante", "Certificado de graduacion", "Mi felicidad", "Cuento de mi familia" y otras peliculas de ficcion.
					
					 Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en la Casa Internacional de Cinematografia de Pyongyang la ceremonia de apertura con la participacion de los funcionarios correspondientes, los creadores y artistas de la rama de cinematografia, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes celebran con bailes el 9 de abril
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes celebran con bailes el 9 de abril
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 25o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvieron lugar el dia 9 los bailes de jovenes y estudiantes en distintas localidades del pais.
					En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de esta capital, los participantes iniciaron el baile al son de la cancion "Que reciba la felicitacion del pueblo". 
					
					Danzando al compas de "Al Lucero General, mas alla de las nubes" y otras canciones, los bailarines expresaron agradecimiento al lider antecesor. 
					
					Continuaron sus movimientos coreograficos cantando en coro "Nuestro companero Kim Jong Un" con el honor y orgullo de tener a Kim Jong Un como Maximo Dirigente.
					
					"Oda a la juventud" y "Somos jinetes de Mallima" llevaron al climax el ambiente festivo. 
					
					Este dia, se llevaron a cabo los bailes en todas las cabeceras provinciales del pais.

articles.title: Seran eternas las hazanas de Kim Jong Il, apunta Rodong Sinmun en su editorial
articles.content:
Seran eternas las hazanas de Kim Jong Il, apunta Rodong Sinmun en su editorial
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun dedico el editorial de este lunes al aniversario 25 de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El 9 de abril, el Dirigente asumio ese importante cargo segun la voluntad y deseo unanimes de los militares y habitantes coreanos. Gracias a este dia, se dio firme continuidad a la idea y la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre la construccion de una patria prospera y quedo abierta la epoca de marcha galopante hacia la potencia socialista, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					Kim Jong Il es el patriota y politico veterano sin par quien sento la eterna base para la prosperidad de la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Con la firme politica independiente y la original de Songun, situo en el plano cimero la dignidad de la RPDC y la convirtio en una potencia militar invencible, hecho que constituye su hazana que se registrara para siempre en los anales de la patria.
					
					Otra proeza relevante es haber transformado a la RPDC como una gran familia socialista practicando la noble politica de amor al pueblo.
					
					La hazana mas grande realizada por la prosperidad eterna de la RPDC fue la solucion perfecta del problema de sucesion de la direccion.
					
					Brillaran para siempre todas las proezas del Presidente del CDN de la RPDC quien hizo todo lo posible por la patria y el pueblo abriendose el paso en el camino inexplorado de la historia.
